summary:
Doxycycline is a powerful antibiotic used to fight many types of infections, like pneumonia, acne, and Lyme disease. It also helps prevent malaria. You can take it as a pill or get it through an IV.

Common side effects include tummy troubles like diarrhea and nausea. It can also make your skin more sensitive to the sun. Doxycycline has been around since the 1960s and is considered a vital medicine by the World Health Organization. It's a popular medication, especially in the United States.
title: Doxycycline
